contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 30, 1911 D Crystal Palace (Boys Section)
Crystal Palace (Boys Section) 200 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) crystal-palace-boys-section
Lucia di Lammermoor - Fantasia [arr. Round]
Crystal Palace, Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK The conductor of St Pancras School Band, Mr. Woodland, died the week before the contest, and an under-16 year old pupil and band member, O. Deary, took his place and conducted the band to victory.
Bands also played the march "Resolute" (Newby)
6 bands competed
April 23, 2013, 2:06 p.m. Feb. 22, 2015, 3:49 p.m.
1 St. Pancras School Owen Geary
2 Shirley Schools J. Machell
3 Shaftesbury School W. Prosser
Unknown Result Sidcup Schools R. Bonner
Unknown Result St Nicholas School P. McDonald
Unknown Result St Vincent School Frank MacDonald
